titles.title: I Am Coming To The Cross (easy - chorus after

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am trusting Lord in Thee Blessed Lamb of Calvary Humbly at Thy cross I bow Save me Jesus save me now{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am coming to the cross I am poor and weak and blind I am counting all but dross I shall full salvation find{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Long my heart has sighed for Thee Long has evil reigned within Jesus sweetly speaks to me I will cleanse you from all sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here I give my all to Thee Friends and time and earthly store Soul and body Thine to be Wholly Thine forevermore{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the promises I trust Now I feel the blood applied I am prostrate in the dust I with Christ am crucified{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus comes He fills my soul Perfected in Him I am I am ev'ry whit made whole Glory glory to the Lamb{/lang-eng}
